p: A total of 95 Swiss albino mice of both sexes (weighing 24–30g and age 6–8 weeks) were used for the experiment. The mice were kept at room temperature with a 12h light/12h dark cycle and given food and water ad labium. After randomization into various groups and before initiation of the experiment, the mice were acclimatized to the laboratory conditions of the Department of Pharmacology, College of Medicine & Health Sciences, University of Gondar. Animal handling and care was carried out throughout the experiment according to international laboratory animal use and care guidelines. 20 The euthanasia procedure was conducted in a chemical fume hood to prevent inhalation of halothane by workers. Finally, cervical dislocation was used on mice to ensure that they have been properly euthanized. The Plasmodium berghei ANKA strain (Chloroquine sensitive) was obtained from EPHI_ Addis Ababa. 21
